005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.MetaschemaConstants;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.AbstractBoundModule;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundModule;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaModule;
015
016import java.net.URI;
017import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Map;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023@MetaschemaModule(
024    fields = {
025        UseName.class,
026        Remarks.class,
027        ConstraintValueEnum.class
028    },
029    assemblies = {
030        METASCHEMA.class,
031        MetapathNamespace.class,
032        InlineDefineAssembly.class,
033        InlineDefineField.class,
034        InlineDefineFlag.class,
035        Any.class,
036        AssemblyReference.class,
037        FieldReference.class,
038        FlagReference.class,
039        AssemblyModel.class,
040        JsonValueKeyFlag.class,
041        GroupingAs.class,
042        Example.class,
043        Property.class,
044        JsonKey.class,
045        AssemblyConstraints.class,
046        FieldConstraints.class,
047        FlagConstraints.class,
048        ConstraintLetExpression.class,
049        FlagAllowedValues.class,
050        FlagExpect.class,
051        FlagIndexHasKey.class,
052        FlagMatches.class,
053        TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint.class,
054        TargetedMatchesConstraint.class,
055        TargetedExpectConstraint.class,
056        TargetedIndexHasKeyConstraint.class,
057        KeyConstraintField.class,
058        TargetedIsUniqueConstraint.class,
059        TargetedIndexConstraint.class,
060        TargetedHasCardinalityConstraint.class,
061        MetaschemaModuleConstraints.class,
062        MetaschemaMetaConstraints.class,
063        MetaschemaMetapath.class,
064        MetapathContext.class
065    })
066public final class MetaschemaModelModule
067    extends AbstractBoundModule {
068  @NonNull
069  private static final MarkupLine NAME = MarkupLine.fromMarkdown("Metaschema Model");
070
071  @NonNull
072  private static final String SHORT_NAME = "metaschema-model";
073
074  @NonNull
075  private static final String VERSION = "1.0.0-M2";
076
077  @NonNull
078  private static final URI XML_NAMESPACE = MetaschemaConstants.METASCHEMA_NAMESPACE_URI;
079
080  @NonNull
081  private static final URI JSON_BASE_URI = MetaschemaConstants.METASCHEMA_NAMESPACE_URI;
082
083  @NonNull
084  private static final Map<String, String> NAMESPACE_BINDINGS;
085
086  static {
087    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap") Map<String, String> bindings = new LinkedHashMap<>();
088
089    NAMESPACE_BINDINGS = bindings;
090  }
091
092  public MetaschemaModelModule(
093      @NonNull List<? extends IBoundModule> importedModules,
094      @NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext) {
095    super(importedModules, bindingContext);
096  }
097
098  @Override
099  public MarkupLine getName() {
100    return NAME;
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  public String getShortName() {
105    return SHORT_NAME;
106  }
107
108  @Override
109  public String getVersion() {
110    return VERSION;
111  }
112
113  @Override
114  public URI getXmlNamespace() {
115    return XML_NAMESPACE;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public URI getJsonBaseUri() {
120    return JSON_BASE_URI;
121  }
122
123  @Override
124  public MarkupMultiline getRemarks() {
125    return null;
126  }
127
128  @Override
129  public Map<String, String> getNamespaceBindings() {
130    return NAMESPACE_BINDINGS;
131  }
132}
